author: iSazonov
body:
Fix #3692.

## Fix description
After the fix Import-Csv support CR (\r), LF (\n), CRLF (\r\n) as line delimiters.

comments.author: markekraus
comments.body: @iSazonov are there existing test cases for all three line ending scenarios?

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: Yes, I added new test. Oops...  lost commit.

title: Add support LF newlines in Import-Csv
